message: لو في موقع رفع فيديوهات وعايز اخلي في ال video player يعرض الفيديو بجودتين HD & SD هل لازم ارفع الفيديو مرتين كل واحد فيهم بجودة ولا في players بتقدر تغير الجودة لوحدها ! انا دورة عي جوجل ووصلت ل plugin اسمها Videojs بس مقدرتش افهم من ال Docs هل لازم ازود ال player ب اتنين Format واحد HD والتاني SD ولا لا !!

data.message:
Current approaches in video streaming is based on adaptive streaming over HTTP, where the server stores multiple copies of the original video in different formats and qualities (bitrates). Each copy is divided into segments of equal length. The client is smart and chooses the qualities of each segment during the streaming session based on different objectives. 

The major vendor-free standardization effort is DASH. It simply defines a file (it defines many things as well) called media presentation descriptor (MPD) that lists the available segments and their qualities. The file in addition to the video copies are stored in HTTP server. The client fetches this file at the beginning and decides during the streaming session what quality to fetch. 

There are many JS clients that adopt DASH:
- dash.js (DASH-IF): the reference client implementation from DASH industry forum
- video.js: if you use videojs, you should use this plugin with it (https://github.com/videojs/videojs-contrib-dash)
- shaka player (google): https://github.com/google/shaka-player

You'll notice that all these libraries request an MPD file, not a video. In your case, your task is to:
- encode the original video into multiple copies with different qualities (SD, HD, etc...)
- segment each copy
- generate the MPD file that lists the segments locations and their qualities
- use one of the previous libraries with the URL of generated MPD.

You can use ffmpeg for encoding, and Bento (https://www.bento4.com/developers/dash/) for segmenting videos and generating the MPD.
DASH technology is what you seek about , you have to use Media server that support mult bitrates LIKE WOWZA you may apply some ffmpeg in your server side , and also you need player support DASH
